meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vast.
meanings.sent1: The vastity of the ocean amazed the children on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The vastity of the desert stretched out before us endlessly.
meanings.sent3: The vastity of the playground made it perfect for a game of tag.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination had the vastity of a universe waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The vastity of the night sky filled him with wonder and awe.

meanings.definition: The extent or size of something immense.
meanings.sent1: The vastity of the mountain range took our breath away.
meanings.sent2: The vastity of the library's collection was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The vastity of the cake made it impossible to finish in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt the vastity of her love for him.
meanings.sent5: The vastity of the task ahead seemed daunting but exciting.

meanings.sent1: The vastity of the field was perfect for a picnic with friends.
meanings.sent2: The vastity of the forest made it easy to get lost in its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The vastity of the parking lot made finding a spot a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The vastity of the sky above them seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent5: The vastity of the beach allowed for endless exploration and relaxation.
